docs.text: This site hosts the documentation about the Conference Assembly Tool ( CAT ) . CAT is a project to create JACoW proceedings . It consists of an Indico plugin called Proceedings Utility Running Remotely ( PURR ) and of a web application called Machine Editor for cOnferences Website ( MEOW ) .
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: This site hosts the documentation about the Conference Assembly Tool ( CAT ) . CAT is a project to create JACoW proceedings . It consists of an Indico plugin called Proceedings Utility Running Remotely ( PURR ) and of a web application called Machine Editor for cOnferences Website ( MEOW ) .
